item.title: Research a Company Fast! ⏱️ • Visit the company's official website for key info. • Check recent news articles about the company. • Review their LinkedIn page for updates and culture. • Look up employee reviews on Glassdoor or Indeed. How can you use this quick research to tailor your application? #jobsearch #interviewprep #ScalePilot #SocialPilot #AIAutomations
